sub_title: Customs Officer at Zambia Revenue Authority (ZRA)
summary:
Customs officer and former lecturer of English with demonstrated good interpersonal and communication skills. Result-oriented and team worker/leader among other attributes.
I have also demonstrated organizational and research skills acquired through exposure to projects and strategic planning for various programmes and activities I was involved in.
I am very interested in building a career in development, international relations, and trade that will build on my skills and knowledge of customs.
